languages.text: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж носит легкую {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на половину {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} брони этого элемента снаряжения.

traits.locale_text: As long as the character wears light armour, their dodge is increased by half of the armour bonus of that armour.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by 1% for every 3% of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} that armour provides.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of that item.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of that item.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of that item.

As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of that item.

languages.text: Mientras el personaje lleve {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}armadura ligera{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} aumenta en +1 % por cada 3 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} que conceda el objeto.
languages.original_text: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el personaje lleve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} ligera, su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} aumenta en la mitad de la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por armadura.

languages.text: このキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}ライトアーマー{/g}を身に着けている限り、そのアーマーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の3%ごとに{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が1%増加する。
languages.original_text: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターがライト{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を身に着けている限り、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}がそのアーマーのアーマー{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分増加する。

languages.text: 只要角色穿着{g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}轻型护甲{/g}，该角色{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}就会提高。装备的护甲每提供3%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的闪避就会提高1%。
languages.original_text: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 只要角色穿着轻型{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，该角色{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}就会提高，等同于护甲{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}的一半。

languages.text: Solange der Charakter eine {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}leichte Rüstung{/g} trägt, wird sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} je 3 % des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Rüstungsbonus{/g} des Gegenstands um +1 % erhöht.{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Charakter eine leichte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} trägt, wird sein {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} um die Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} dieser Rüstung erhöht.

Solange der Charakter eine {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}leichte Rüstung{/g} trägt, wird sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} je 3 % des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Rüstungsbonus{/g} des Gegenstands um +1 % erhöht.{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}{/g}

languages.text: Tant que le personnage porte une {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}armure légère{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} augmente de +1 % pour chaque tranche de 3 % du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} de l'objet.
languages.original_text: As long as the character wears {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}light armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +1% for every 3% of the item's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le personnage porte une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} légère, son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} augmente de la moitié du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'armure de cette armure.

Tant que le personnage porte une {g|Encyclopedia:LightArmour}armure légère{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} augmente de +1 % pour chaque tranche de 3 % du {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} de l'objet.

languages.text: Когда персонаж носит легкую {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на 1% за каждые 3% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} брони этого элемента снаряжения.
languages.original_text: As long as the character wears light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} is increased by half of the armour {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of that armour.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж носит легкую {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на половину {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} брони этого элемента снаряжения.

Когда персонаж носит легкую {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} увеличивается на половину {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} брони этого элемента снаряжения.
